title: Bug 116786 - Library include should store relative path
description:
When a library is included in a report design, the BIRT designer currently stores the absolute path. We need to modify it to store the relative path.

Currently, the library inclusion is stored as:
<property name="fileName">/E:/birt/sampleReports/otherlib/lib1.rptlibrary</property>
<property name="namespace">lib1</property>

The expected behavior is for the library inclusion to be stored as:
<property name="fileName">$project/test/lib1.rptlibrary</property>

Example: Suppose my report design is saved in the path $project/test. When I include a library in the report design, the BIRT designer should generate and store the relative path.
OB: Currently, I observe that the report design stores the absolute path for the library inclusion.
EB:
The BIRT designer should generate and store the relative path when a library is included in a report design.
Example: If my report design is saved in the path $project/test, the library inclusion should be stored as $project/test/lib1.rptlibrary.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Create a report design and save it in a specific path.
2. Include a library in the report design.
3. Observe that the library inclusion is stored with an absolute path instead of a relative path.
